name: Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock (adventuretron)
description:
Phoning in my April #1GAM at the last minute with a year-old starter project. I smoothed out some edges and accidentally added a god-mode (see if you can find it). Deploying to HTML is fun!

With thanks to Sam Kass and Karen Bryla for inventing the original game.

If the game doesn't capture your keyboard (and therefore doesn't start), try clicking in the black space above the game window. Sorry :-/

Code by @RubyIsDog with LibGDX
